== Who ==
'''mdamt''' is '''Mohammad Dhani Anwari Mohammad-Taib''' (<nowiki>[[http://www.ohloh.net/accounts/mdamt|Ohloh]]</nowiki> | <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/~mdamt|Launchpad]]</nowiki> | <nowiki>[[http://linkedin.com/in/mdamt|LinkedIn]]</nowiki> | <nowiki>[[http://flickr.com/photos/mdamt|Flickr]]</nowiki>)

== Relevant activities ==
=== Ubuntu Indonesia ===
* Educating mailing list members on how to develop open/free source softwares, mainly in packaging and copyright/license related (since 2007)
* Advisory Board member at Ubuntu Indonesia Foundation (since 2007)
* Infrastructure coordinator at the <nowiki>[[http://www.blankonlinux.or.id|BlankOn project]]</nowiki>, an Ubuntu derivative distribution (since 2007)

=== Others ===
* <nowiki>[[http://maemo.org/profile/view/mdamt/|Senior Software Engineer at Maemo Software at Nokia]]</nowiki>, responsible for Hildon Input Method (since 2005)
* <nowiki>[[http://live.gnome.org/AccountsTeam|Accounts Team]]</nowiki> (since 2007) and <nowiki>[[http://foundation.gnome.org/membership/members.php|GNOME Foundation]]</nowiki> (since 2005) member at GNOME 
* <nowiki>[[http://l10n.gnome.org/people/mdamt|Indonesian Localisation coordinator at GNOME]]</nowiki> (since 2003)
* Co-Founder of Linux Indonesia (1997) <nowiki>[[http://www.linux.or.id/tentang|link in Indonesian]]</nowiki>
